data.title: JR Smith - 2017-18 - Track & Field
data.meta_description:
JR SmithJumps  - Honors: ACC Academic Honor Roll (2015, 2016, 2017)
2016-17: Competed in eight events during the indoor season and in five events during
data.text:
Honors: ACC Academic Honor Roll (2015, 2016, 2017)

2016-17: Competed in eight events during the indoor season and in five events during the outdoor portion of the schedule…Ran a season-best 7.11 in the 60m at the Armory Invitational (2/4)…Finished in fifth place in the long jump at the VT Challenge (2/18) with a personal-best jump of 22-9.00 (6.98)…Jumped a season-best 23-7.25 (7.08) in the long jump at the Virginia Grand Prix (4/29)…Qualified for the ACC Outdoor Championships (5/14) in the same event and finished in 14th place…Named to the ACC Academic Honor Roll.

2015-16: Did not compete during the indoor or outdoor season…named to the ACC Academic Honor Roll for the second consecutive year.

2014-15: Indoors, produced the Blue Devil men’s top 60m dash time of the season, clocking a 7.08 in the prelims at the Virginia Tech Elite (2/6) to finish 14th…ran a prelim time of 7.14 to take 21st at the Hokie Invitational (1/23)…kicked off his first meet in a Blue Devil uniform by running a prelim time of 7.21 at the Carolina Cup (1/16), then placed eighth in the finals with a 7.20…competing in the long jump, logged a season-best mark of 21-9.00 (6.63) to claim 16th at the Hokie Invitational (1/24)…placed fifth at the Carolina Cup (1/16) after leaping 21-7.50 (6.59)…did not compete during the 2015 outdoor season…named to the ACC Academic Honor Roll.
